p: The EtOAc extract (3.0 g) of the roots of O. cufodontii was adsorbed and subjected to silica gel (150 g) column chromatography with increasing polarities of EtOAc in n-hexane as eluent to give 41 fractions, each 50 mL. Fraction 7 eluted with n-hexane:EtOAc (9:1) afford compound 4 (30 mg). On the other hand, fraction 37 and 38 eluted with n-hexane:EtOAc (3:7) were merged to give compound 5 (23 mg).
